Unlike Weapons Proficiency, Armour Proficiency is essential or you will be facing serious penalties. Characters who wear Armour they aren't proficient with, cannot cast Spells and will have disadvantage on all Ability Checks, Saving Throws and Attack Rolls that involve Strength or Dexterity.
